msbt.message: Some bugs can be quite dangerous out in nature. Fortunately, you can safely observe them in here.
When I think about these little bugs and the lives they live, I can't help but respect everything they do.
Bugs come in some truly strange shapes, don't they? Sometimes I can't help but stare at them. Oh dear! I hope they don't think I'm being rude!
Isn't it wonderful the way this hot room recreates the bugs' natural habitat? I know dear Blathers isn't fond of bugs, but he doesn't let that affect his work. He's a true professional.
This room does get rather hot after a while Well, as long as the bugs are happy, that's all that matters.
I love how this room recreates the feel of a forest path.What a pleasure it is to observe bugs in their natural habitat, .
This room is always warm and the flowers are always in bloom.For the little darlings on display here, it must be like living in paradise.
Isn't this hot room lovely? It's the perfect place to sit and watch the bugs go about their lives. HmmmI wonder if the bugs ever wish they could watch us go about our lives for a change?
This hot room is one of my favorites. I must say, Blathers has a rather elegant design sensibility.
Thank you for coming all this way to visit our island's museum, my dear. I do hope you're enjoying our insect exhibits. Even though they are bugs, they're still quite special.
Have you been bitten by the bug- watching bug? I certainly hope so!If you have, you should take a gander at our bug exhibits. They are well worth your time, .
So, how do you find the museum?The bug rooms may be full of, well, bugsbut I think they're quite stylish, .
I'm so pleased to see a magnificent museum like this open on the island. It's just so civilized! Even the bug exhibit has its charms. As long as one finds bugs charming, that is.

I don't know about you, but I am having a fabulous time looking around our newly opened museum.I feel like an honest-to-goodness explorer, !And like the brave explorer I am, I have boldly entered the bug exhibit. Despite the fact it is FULL OF BUGS!

We finally built a museum on this island. And a beautiful one at that!I am SO in love with this place, I don't even mind that there's a whole wing dedicated to BUGS! The bug exhibit isislovely. I assure you, that is NOT something I ever thought I'd say, .
